column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////In my experience at this restaurant all of these previous reviews become invalidated. Dreadfully
column2: the Lou Malnati's Pizzeria experience was terrible. The tomato sauce overpowered everything
column3: I didn't order a tomato soup. My last two comments are; this pizza joint is at par to Walmart pizza
column5: Giordano's is recommended if you are thinking of trying a new spot.
